video.title: Relaciones peligrosas
video.synopsis: Miranda Cruz never thought it possible to find a love that would cost her freedom, a love condemned by society and that will change her life forever.

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio saves Miranda Cruz from rape when Rodrigo and Omar's drug abuse leads to the worst experience of their lives.
episodes.title: Vidas peligrosas

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo is on the verge of suicide because of his drug abuse.
episodes.title: Muerte inesperada

episodes.synopsis: Miranda can't get Mauricio out of her head and tells Paty all about how she feels.
episodes.title: Trago amargo

episodes.synopsis: Oliver threatens to report Miranda to the police for getting involved with a minor if she doesn't do what he wants.
episodes.title: Juego peligroso

episodes.synopsis: Oliver is out of control and threatens to kill Miranda if they don't leave him alone.
episodes.title: Al extremo

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio takes on Oliver in order to save Miranda from the clutches of a rapist.
episodes.title: Hasta el límite

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio catches Miranda and JP kissing and is consumed with jealousy.
episodes.title: Amor que mata

episodes.synopsis: Máximo threatens Cassius and warns him to stay away from his girlfriend or else.
episodes.title: Celos racistas

episodes.synopsis: Ana Conde reveals her racist attitude against Cassius Dupont.
episodes.title: Maestra racista

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio risks it all for Miranda's love.
episodes.title: Trampa al amor

episodes.synopsis: Cassius reports about the bullying he's getting from Máximo and Gonzalo at school.
episodes.title: Víctima de acoso

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio will do whatever it takes to defend Miranda against Oliver's blackmail scheme.
episodes.title: Cuentas pendientes

episodes.synopsis: Miranda can't bear seeing her naked photo plastered along the school corridors. Mauricio beats up Diego for publishing the photo from the wager.
episodes.title: Mentiras que matan

episodes.synopsis: Oliver orders his thugs to follow Miranda so he can get his revenge on her.
episodes.title: Peligro inminente

episodes.synopsis: Miranda is the victim of Oliver and his gang's revenge plot.
episodes.title: Cobrar cuentas

episodes.synopsis: Oliver's gang makes a failed attempt to kill Miranda.
episodes.title: Intento de asesinato

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio gets into the dangerous drug business to save Miranda's life.
episodes.title: Amor peligroso

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio falls into Billy's trap when he makes his first drug delivery.
episodes.title: Trampa del destino

episodes.synopsis: Oliver's lawyer threatens to turn Miranda over to the police.
episodes.title: Ojo por ojo

episodes.synopsis: Santiago threatens Gonzalo and Max for drugging Cassius at school.
episodes.title: Peligro inminente II

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio will do whatever it takes to defend Miranda against Oliver's blackmail scheme.
episodes.title: Amor imposible

episodes.synopsis: Oliver orders his thugs to follow Miranda so he can get his revenge on her.

episodes.synopsis: Miranda is the victim of Oliver and his gang's revenge plot.
episodes.title: Violencia familiar

episodes.title: Volver a amar

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio gets into the dangerous drug business to save Miranda's life.
episodes.title: Atrapados

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio falls into Billy's trap when he makes his first drug delivery.
episodes.title: Mentir por amor

episodes.synopsis: Oliver's lawyer threatens to turn Miranda over to the police.
episodes.title: Abismo de muerte

episodes.synopsis: Santiago threatens Gonzalo and Max for drugging Cassius at school.
episodes.title: Buscando pistas

episodes.synopsis: Juan Pablo admits his past mistakes to Miranda.
episodes.title: Pasado peligroso

episodes.synopsis: Santiago faces off with Gilberto over Ana.
episodes.title: Fiesta peligrosa

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio says goodbye to Miranda and tells her he'll love her forever.
episodes.title: Despedida

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio is involved in a life-threatening accident.
episodes.title: Desgracia por amor

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio's life is hanging by a thread.
episodes.title: Riesgo de muerte

episodes.synopsis: Mirando decides to stay away from Mauricio's love.
episodes.title: Profundo dolor

episodes.synopsis: Juan Pablo suggests that he and Miranda be a couple to protect her from the police.
episodes.title: Propuesta indecente

episodes.synopsis: The police look for evidence against Miranda.
episodes.title: Mentiras que matan II

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio calls Olivia on her jealousy over Miranda.
episodes.title: Sentimientos encontrados

episodes.synopsis: Carmen discovers the forbidden relationship between Mauricio and his teacher, Miranda.
episodes.title: Verdades que matan

episodes.synopsis: Carmen reports the teacher, Miranda, to Detective Olivia.
episodes.title: Cobrando cuentas

episodes.synopsis: Detective Olivia arrests the teacher, Miranda.
episodes.title: Pagando culpas II

episodes.synopsis: Miranda takes a beating in jail.
episodes.title: Golpes de la vida

episodes.synopsis: Pain and rejection are Miranda's cell mates.
episodes.title: Presa por amor

episodes.synopsis: Miranda and Mauricio lie to the judge.
episodes.title: Bajo juramento

episodes.synopsis: Olivia kisses Mauricio and confesses she's in love with him.
episodes.title: Leyes prohibidas

episodes.synopsis: Miranda discovers she is pregnant.
episodes.title: Nueva vida

episodes.synopsis: Santiago fears for his daughter's life.
episodes.title: Vida en riesgo

episodes.synopsis: Miranda confesses to JP that Mauricio is her son's father.
episodes.title: Todo por amor

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo kills a mafia hitman in self-defense.
episodes.title: Sed de venganza

episodes.synopsis: Juan Pablo will stop at nothing to hold onto Miranda's love.
episodes.title: Contra la corriente

episodes.synopsis: Miranda lies to Mauricio so he'll stay away from her.
episodes.title: Sacrificio de amor

episodes.synopsis: Olivia tries to seduce Mauricio.
episodes.title: Desborde de pasión

episodes.synopsis: Miranda asks JP to be her son's father.
episodes.title: Juego de sentimientos

episodes.synopsis: Miranda will stay away from Mauricio for good.
episodes.title: Despedida II

episodes.synopsis: JP gets desperate when he can't find Miranda.
episodes.title: Loco de amor

episodes.synopsis: The mafia has a hit out on Miranda.
episodes.title: Atentado

episodes.synopsis: Olivares saves Miranda's life.
episodes.title: Golpe de suerte

episodes.synopsis: Miranda asks JP to be her son's father.
episodes.title: Amor que mata II

episodes.synopsis: Santiago suffers over his father's life.
episodes.title: Muerte lenta

episodes.synopsis: Santiago mourns his father's death.
episodes.title: Dolor profundo

episodes.synopsis: JP asks Miranda to marry him.
episodes.title: Propuesta

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio rejects Olivia's love.
episodes.title: Sin amor

episodes.synopsis: JP announces his marriage with Miranda.
episodes.title: Sin escrúpulos

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio finds out about Miranda's pregnancy.
episodes.title: Verdad que mata

episodes.synopsis: Andrés's jealously drives him to beat his wife.
episodes.title: Maltrato

episodes.synopsis: There's a mafia hit on Mauricio's father.
episodes.title: Asesinos

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo is tortured by Andrés.
episodes.title: Celos mortales

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio wants get revenge on the mafia.
episodes.title: Deuda de honor

episodes.synopsis: Miranda decides to be with JP.
episodes.title: Amor que mata III

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio is dying of jealousy over Miranda's rejection.
episodes.title: Despecho

episodes.synopsis: Miranda announces her engagement to JP.
episodes.title: Anuncio fatal

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio wants to stop Miranda's wedding from happening.
episodes.title: La ilusión

episodes.synopsis: Miranda marries JP right in front of Mauricio.
episodes.title: Perder el amor

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio and Olivia have sex.
episodes.title: Amantes por despecho

episodes.synopsis: The police arrest Andrés Máximo.
episodes.title: Arrestado

episodes.synopsis: Miranda tells Mauricio that JP is the father of the child she's carrying. Meanwhile, Andrés Máximo rots in prison for his crimes.
episodes.title: Ilusiones rotas

episodes.synopsis: Yesenia is kidnapped by the mafia.
episodes.title: Venganzas

episodes.synopsis: Miranda confesses to Mauricio that the child she's carrying is his.
episodes.title: Amor eterno

episodes.synopsis: Joaco will do anything to save his sister.
episodes.title: Riesgo total

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo admits that Andrés is a killer.
episodes.title: Enfrentados

episodes.synopsis: Miranda lies to JP to cover up for Mauricio.
episodes.title: Verdades a medias

episodes.synopsis: Max threatens his father because of the disgrace he's brought.
episodes.title: Rivales a muerte

episodes.synopsis: Olivia pressures Mauricio with reopening the case.
episodes.title: Peligro de amor

episodes.synopsis: JP swears an oath of vengeance with Olivia.
episodes.title: Pacto mortal

episodes.synopsis: Juaquín falls in a mafia trap trying to save Yesenia.
episodes.title: Cae en la trampa

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio looks for a solution to the situation with Miranda.
episodes.title: Buscando salidas

episodes.synopsis: Life starts to take everyone to task for their actions.
episodes.title: Pagando cuentas

episodes.synopsis: Carmen interrogates Miranda about her pregnancy.
episodes.title: De frente a la verdad

episodes.synopsis: JP decides to get rid of Olivares.
episodes.title: Muerte segura

episodes.synopsis: Miranda and Mauricio plan to escape together.
episodes.title: Vivir el amor

episodes.synopsis: Olivia threatens to kill Mauricio.
episodes.title: Celos mortales II

episodes.synopsis: The police arrest Miranda and Mauricio.
episodes.title: Atrapados II

episodes.synopsis: Miranda discovers JP's betrayal.
episodes.title: Amor traicionero

episodes.synopsis: Miranda faces up to the heavy hand of the law.
episodes.title: Juicio final

episodes.synopsis: Miranda is sentenced to prison.
episodes.title: Pena de amor

episodes.synopsis: Miranda is sentenced to 10 years in jail.
episodes.title: Presa por amor

episodes.synopsis: Miranda makes Olivia pay for her humiliation.
episodes.title: Ajustando cuentas

episodes.synopsis: Miranda and Mauricio try to find a way to be together again.
episodes.title: Lucha por amor

episodes.synopsis: Mauricio and Miranda make their dream of love happen.
episodes.title: Gran final
